description:
A wonderful paddle for touring. The carbon construction feels lively when you've got some distance to cover. The blade shape slips quietly in and out of the water. Ergonomic grips mimic a bent-shaft design, keeping your wrists and shoulders happy on long tours.

  • Light 2-piece carbon fibre shaft
  • Carbon blade and foam core
  • Efficient blade shape suits low-angle strokes and allows for smooth water entry and exit
  • Soft Advantage Grips dampen vibration
  • 7 degree wrist offset reduces shoulder fatigue and strain on your forearms
  • Ergonomic grips promote proper hand placement
  • LeverLock gives you unlimited blade angle options
name: Accent Pace Foam Core Touring Paddle
